The following template indicates how the mapping is done.

This is the 'Project Bug' template. It should be called in the following format: 
{{Project Bug
|story=
|reporter=
|report date=
|debugger=
|fix date=
|priority=
|status=
|attachment=
}}
Edit the page to see the template text. {| style="width: 30em; font-size: 90%; border: 1px solid #aaaaaa; background-color: #f9f9f9; color: black; margin-bottom: 0.5em; margin-left: 1em; padding: 0.2em; float: right; clear: right; text-align:left;" ! {{head color box|#ccccff|{{#if:{{{priority|}}}|{{#ifexpr: {{{priority|}}} < 2 |red}}}}|font-size:medium;}} colspan="2" |{{PAGENAME}} |- ! Related story | [[Project story::{{{story|}}}]] |- ! Reporter | [[Bug reporter::{{{reporter|}}}]] |- ! Report date | [[Bug report date::{{{report date|}}}]] {{#arraymap:{{{sprint output|}}}|/|y|*[[Sprint output::y]]|\n}} |- {{#if:{{{priority|}}}| ! Priority {{!}} [[Bug priority::{{{priority|}}}]] }} |- ! Debugger | [[Debugger::{{{debugger|}}}]] |- ! Fix date | [[Bug fix date::{{{fix date|}}}]] |- ! Status | [[Project bug status::{{{status|}}}]] |} {{#if:{{{attachment|}}}| ==Attachment(s)== {{#arraymap:{{{attachment|}}}|,|x|x|
}} }} [[Category:Project bugs]]

<noinclude>
This is the 'Project Bug' form.
To add a page with this form, enter the page name below;
if a page with that name already exists, you will be sent to a form to edit that page.

{{#forminput:Project Bug}}

</noinclude><includeonly>
{{{for template|Project Bug}}}
{| class="formtable"
! Related story:
| {{{field|story}}}
|-
! Reporter:
| {{{field|reporter}}}
|-
! Report date:
| {{{field|report date}}}
|-
! Debugger:
| {{{field|debugger}}}
|-
! Fix date:
| {{{field|fix date}}}
|-
! Status:
| {{{field|status}}}
|}
{{{end template}}}

'''Free text:'''

{{{field|free text}}}


{{{standard input|summary}}}

{{{standard input|minor edit}}} {{{standard input|watch}}}

{{{standard input|save}}} {{{standard input|preview}}} {{{standard input|changes}}} {{{standard input|cancel}}}
</includeonly>

revision.text: This property has been created but not edited. Please enter meaningful content. [[Has type:=Type:Text]]

This is the 'Project Task' template. It should be called in the following format: 
{{Project Task
|story=
|owner=
|start date=
|end date=
|status=
|description=
}}
Edit the page to see the template text. {| style="width: 30em; font-size: 90%; border: 1px solid #aaaaaa; background-color: #f9f9f9; color: black; margin-bottom: 0.5em; margin-left: 1em; padding: 0.2em; float: right; clear: right; text-align:left;" ! colspan="2" |{{PAGENAME}} |- ! Story | [[Project story::{{{story|}}}]] |- ! Owner | [[Project task owner::{{{owner|}}}]] |- ! Start date | [[Project task start date::{{{start date|}}}]] |- ! End date | [[Project task end date::{{{end date|}}}]] |- ! Status | [[Project task status::{{{status|}}}]] |} ==Description== [[Project task description::{{{description|}}}]] [[Category:Project tasks]]

revision.comment: New page: <noinclude> This is the 'Project Task' form. To add a page with this form, enter the page name below; if a page with that name already exists, you will be sent to a form to edit that page....
revision.text:
<noinclude>
This is the 'Project Task' form.
To add a page with this form, enter the page name below;
if a page with that name already exists, you will be sent to a form to edit that page.

{{#forminput:Project Task}}

</noinclude><includeonly>
{{{for template|Project Task}}}
{| class="formtable"
! Story:
| {{{field|story}}}
|-
! Owner:
| {{{field|owner}}}
|-
! Start date:
| {{{field|start date}}}
|-
! End date :
| {{{field|end date }}}
|-
! Status:
| {{{field|status|default=In progress}}}
|-
! Description:
| {{{field|description}}}
|}
{{{end template}}}

'''Free text:'''

{{{field|free text}}}


{{{standard input|summary}}}

{{{standard input|minor edit}}} {{{standard input|watch}}}

{{{standard input|save}}} {{{standard input|preview}}} {{{standard input|changes}}} {{{standard input|cancel}}}
</includeonly>

This is the 'Wiki Mail' template. It should be called in the following format: 
{{Wiki Mail
|subject=
|from=
|to=
|cc=
|sent=
|attachment=
}}
Edit the page to see the template text. ---- {| {{#if:{{{subject|}}}| ! Subject {{!}} [[Mail subject::{{{subject|}}}]] {{!}}- }} {{#if:{{{from|}}}| ! From {{!}} [[Mail from::{{{from|}}}]] {{!}}- }} {{#if:{{{to|}}}| ! To {{!}} {{#arraymap:{{{to|}}}|,|x|[[Mail to::x]]}} {{!}}- }} {{#if:{{{cc|}}}| ! Cc {{!}} {{#arraymap:{{{cc|}}}|,|x|[[Mail cc::x]]}} {{!}}- }} {{#if:{{{sent|}}}| ! Sent {{!}} [[Mail sent::{{{sent|}}}]] }} |} ---- {{#if:{{{attachment|}}}| ==Attachment(s)== {{#arraymap:{{{attachment|}}}|,|x|x|
}} }}
[[has type::Type:Date]]
[[has type::Type:Email]]
[[has type::Type:Email]]
[[has type::Type:Email]]
